item.title: I quit Ozempic and embraced feeling healthy over striving for thinness
item.description: Taking the drug made one writer feel so sick she quit and focused on healthy habits instead of her body size. Turns out, 65% of people using GLP-1 drugs for weight loss quit within a year.

item.title: Where will Travis Hunter, Cam Ward and other top players be picked in the NFL Draft?
item.description: It's been almost 30 years since an NFL player played a true two-way season. Heisman winner Travis Hunter could be the next — but first, he has to be selected in the NFL Draft, which begins Thursday.

item.title: Racial disparities in youth incarceration are the widest they've been in decades
item.description: The number of American children and teenagers in juvenile detention has sharply declined over the last few decades, but as overall numbers decrease, data shows Black and Native American youth are far more likely to be incarcerated than white children.

item.title: A dozen states sue the Trump administration to stop tariff policy
item.description: A dozen states have sued the Trump administration in the U.S. Court of International Trade to stop its tariff policy, challenging Trump's claim that he could arbitrarily impose tariffs based on the International Emergency Economic Powers Act.
